author: A Techie's view on the Law
content: […] In todays modern world, where bug bounty programs are common,(A bug bounty program is one where the company providing a service or solution actually pays money to people who find flaws in their product–this encourages ‘white hat’ hackers to test their products to ‘secure unauthorized access’) companies pay hackers to break their systems–that’s how modern security works. That’s how facebook secures it’s servers. […]
